General.Name: Guangdong Xiongsu Technology Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Xiongsu Technology Group Co., Ltd engages in the production and sale of thermoplastic pipe fittings in China. The company offers polyvinyl chloride (PVC)-U, random copolymerized polypropylene (PPR), CPVC, PERT, high density polyethylene (HDPE), PEX, and ABS pipes and fittings, as well as PP compression, flexible conduits, and corrugated pipes. Its products are used in plumbing system; sewer, storm, and drainage infrastructure; heating, cooling, and air vent system; power, electric, and communication system; industrial piping system; home improvement; automotive; and agricultural and irrigation system applications. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Xiongsu Technology Industry Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Xiongsu Technology Group Co., Ltd in 2013. Guangdong Xiongsu Technology Group Co., Ltd was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.
